verses.arabic: هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى ٱلْإِنسَـٰنِ حِينٌ مِّنَ ٱلدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْـًٔا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Has there not been over Man a long period of Time, when he was nothing - (not even) mentioned?
verses.transliteration: Hal ata AAala al-insani heenunmina addahri lam yakun shay-an mathkoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ سَمِيعًۢا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily We created Man from a drop of mingled sperm, in order to try him: So We gave him (the gifts), of Hearing and Sight.
verses.transliteration: Inna khalaqna al-insanamin nutfatin amshajin nabtaleehi fajaAAalnahusameeAAan baseera

verses.arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: We showed him the Way: whether he be grateful or ungrateful (rests on his will).
verses.transliteration: Inna hadaynahu assabeelaimma shakiran wa-imma kafoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّآ أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ سَلَـٰسِلَا۟ وَأَغْلَـٰلًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: For the Rejecters we have prepared chains, yokes, and a blazing Fire.
verses.transliteration: Inna aAAtadna lilkafireenasalasila waaghlalan wasaAAeera

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: As to the Righteous, they shall drink of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Kafur,-
verses.transliteration: Inna al-abrara yashraboona min ka/sinkana mizajuha kafoora

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: A Fountain where the Devotees of Allah do drink, making it flow in unstinted abundance.
verses.transliteration: AAaynan yashrabu biha AAibaduAllahi yufajjiroonaha tafjeera

verses.arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They perform (their) vows, and they fear a Day whose evil flies far and wide.
verses.transliteration: Yoofoona binnathri wayakhafoonayawman kana sharruhu mustateera

verses.arabic: وَيُطْعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they feed, for the love of Allah, the indigent, the orphan, and the captive,-
verses.transliteration: WayutAAimona attaAAamaAAala hubbihi miskeenan wayateeman waaseera

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ ٱللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَآءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: (Saying),"We feed you for the sake of Allah alone: no reward do we desire from you, nor thanks.
verses.transliteration: Innama nutAAimukum liwajhi Allahila nureedu minkum jazaan wala shukoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: "We only fear a Day of distressful Wrath from the side of our Lord."
verses.transliteration: Inna nakhafu min rabbinayawman AAaboosan qamtareera

verses.arabic: فَوَقَىٰهُمُ ٱللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّىٰهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: But Allah will deliver them from the evil of that Day, and will shed over them a Light of Beauty and (blissful) Joy.
verses.transliteration: Fawaqahumu Allahu sharra thalikaalyawmi walaqqahum nadratan wasuroora

verses.arabic: وَجَزَىٰهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا۟ جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And because they were patient and constant, He will reward them with a Garden and (garments of) silk.
verses.transliteration: Wajazahum bima sabaroojannatan wahareera

verses.arabic: مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلْأَرَآئِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining in the (Garden) on raised thrones, they will see there neither the sun's (excessive heat) nor (the moon's) excessive cold.
verses.transliteration: Muttaki-eena feeha AAala al-ara-ikila yarawna feeha shamsan wala zamhareera

verses.arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَـٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And the shades of the (Garden) will come low over them, and the bunches (of fruit), there, will hang low in humility.
verses.transliteration: Wadaniyatan AAalayhim thilaluhawathullilat qutoofuha tathleela

verses.arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا۠
verses.translation: And amongst them will be passed round vessels of silver and goblets of crystal,-
verses.transliteration: Wayutafu AAalayhim bi-aniyatinmin fiddatin waakwabin kanat qawareera

verses.arabic: قَوَارِيرَا۟ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Crystal-clear, made of silver: they will determine the measure thereof (according to their wishes).
verses.transliteration: Qawareera min fiddatinqaddarooha taqdeera

verses.arabic: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And they will be given to drink there of a Cup (of Wine) mixed with Zanjabil,-
verses.transliteration: Wayusqawna feeha ka/san kanamizajuha zanjabeela

verses.arabic: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: A fountain there, called Salsabil.
verses.transliteration: AAaynan feeha tusammasalsabeela

verses.arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَٰنٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: And round about them will (serve) youths of perpetual (freshness): If thou seest them, thou wouldst think them scattered Pearls.
verses.transliteration: Wayatoofu AAalayhim wildanunmukhalladoona itha raaytahum hasibtahum lu/lu-anmanthoora

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when thou lookest, it is there thou wilt see a Bliss and a Realm Magnificent.
verses.transliteration: Wa-itha raayta thamma raaytanaAAeeman wamulkan kabeera

verses.arabic: عَـٰلِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوٓا۟ أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them will be green Garments of fine silk and heavy brocade, and they will be adorned with Bracelets of silver; and their Lord will give to them to drink of a Wine Pure and Holy.
verses.transliteration: AAaliyahum thiyabu sundusinkhudrun wa-istabraqun wahulloo asawira minfiddatin wasaqahum rabbuhum sharaban tahoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَآءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: "Verily this is a Reward for you, and your Endeavour is accepted and recognised."
verses.transliteration: Inna hatha kana lakum jazaanwakana saAAyukum mashkoora

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: It is We Who have sent down the Qur'an to thee by stages.
verses.transliteration: Inna nahnu nazzalnaAAalayka alqur-ana tanzeela

verses.arabic: فَٱصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ ءَاثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Therefore be patient with constancy to the Command of thy Lord, and hearken not to the sinner or the ingrate among them.
verses.transliteration: Fasbir lihukmi rabbikawala tutiAA minhum athiman aw kafoora

verses.arabic: وَٱذْكُرِ ٱسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And celebrate the name of thy Lord morning and evening,
verses.transliteration: Wathkuri isma rabbikabukratan waaseela

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيْلِ فَٱسْجُدْ لَهُۥ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And part of the night, prostrate thyself to Him; and glorify Him a long night through.
verses.transliteration: Wamina allayli fasjud lahu wasabbihhulaylan taweela

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يُحِبُّونَ ٱلْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَآءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: As to these, they love the fleeting life, and put away behind them a Day (that will be) hard.
verses.transliteration: Inna haola-i yuhibboonaalAAajilata wayatharoona waraahum yawmanthaqeela

verses.arabic: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَـٰهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَآ أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَآ أَمْثَـٰلَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: It is We Who created them, and We have made their joints strong; but, when We will, We can substitute the like of them by a complete change.
verses.transliteration: Nahnu khalaqnahum washadadnaasrahum wa-itha shi/na baddalna amthalahumtabdeela

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: This is an admonition: Whosoever will, let him take a (straight) Path to his Lord.
verses.transliteration: Inna hathihi tathkiratun famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi sabeela

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: But ye will not, except as Allah wills; for Allah is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
verses.transliteration: Wama tashaoona illa anyashaa Allahu inna Allaha kanaAAaleeman hakeema

verses.arabic: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًۢا
verses.translation: He will admit to His Mercy whom He will; But the wrong-doers,- for them has He prepared a grievous Penalty.
verses.transliteration: Yudkhilu man yashao fee rahmatihiwaththalimeena aAAadda lahum AAathabanaleema
